IMPORT.NAME: jetty-util
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: jersey-core
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: commons-io
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')
